downloadDescription: The Visual Basic Language Specification provides a complete description of the Visual Basic language 11.0
detailsSection: The Visual Basic Language Specification provides a complete description of the Visual Basic language 11.0.
systemRequirementsSection: The Microsoft Word document download requires 1 MB of disk space to download and install. It also requires Microsoft Word or Microsoft Word Viewer to view.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download link to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
